Server.Name: Old West Migration (V2)
Server.Description:
Old West Town Expansion.
Features Include: - Increases the size of the Old West Town by allowing more town tiles - Increases the amount of Old West Town settlements that can appear in the World - Adds the chance of a road and Trader leading into an Old West Town - Adds a multitude of custom Old West POIs for all Tiers and Quest Types - Converts remnant and decorative default Old West POIs to Quest POIs - Adds custom Old West Tiles - Adds roaming zombies to the Old West Town streets, just like in the Towns and Cities - Allows the Old West Town to appear in the Desert, Forest, Burnt Forest, and Snow Biomes - Adds Old West Trader Bob to the Desert Biome Old West Town - Adds POIs made during play through Streams and for specific Streamers - Used in Preppocalypse and The Wild West Mod
Brought to you by arramus.
